data.message:
Please help by signing my petition 
(In sum what i want is facebook to change their policies to a general consensus of family members votes to or not to permanently delete an individuals Facebook account who does not have a legacy contact and has not specified what to do with their account in the event of their death. As opposed to current policies allowing any one individual freedom to delete a loved ones account for malicious reasons.)https://www.change.org/p/facebook-mark-zuckerberg-facebook-s-policies-need-to-change-a-wife-of-3-years-deleted-my-brothers-facebook-page?recruiter=448333514&utm_source=share_petition&utm_medium=copylink
